WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closed as Rawr.Rogue has been completely reworked.
WorkItem.Description:
Silverlight version of Rawr shows NaN for all gear DPS values in right pane for my Rogue. Works fine for my other toons.
Â 
The toon it fails on is: Neverthere in the Nordrassil Realm. There's something it doesn't like about this toon since I see the same error on another install of the Silverlight version of Rawr with Neverthere while other toons show up just fine.
WorkItem.Summary: [Rogue] NaN displayed instead of DPS values

Comments.Message: I'm having the same issue in Rawr 2.2.24. I've attached the xml for my rogue.  My agility is being calculated as -Infinity so that may be what is throwing off all of the other calculations.
I tested this in 2.2.23 and it works properly. Hopefully that will help pin it down.

I am having this issue as well with 2.2.24.

Magnumous on Azgalor

I'm still having this problem and it appears to be tied to the enchant on my weapons (or at least it is effected by it).  If I use either the Mongoose or the Rune of the Fallen Crusader enchant on either of my weapons I will get NaN for both overall and DPS numbers.  There is also a problem with the Executioner enchant; changing my off-hand from No Enchant to Executioner will change my DPS from 2583 to 1055 (the enchant effects both weapons).  This has been effecting me since at least 2.2.24.  Awesome app though; thanks!
2.2.27 still shows the issue.  Further testing shows that switching my talentes from Mut to Combat (or HAT) fixes the values. But with a Mut build my Agility is -Infinity.

I've also encountered this exact problem. Switching to Berserking clears the problem, but also placing at least one point in the Lightning Reflexes talent (4th tier combat tree) also clears the problem with Mongoose left on the weapon. Hope this helps with the solution.
I just downloaded 2.3.1 and it still has the problem. The last version that worked was 2.2.23. Removing Mongoose from my daggers gets rid of the problem.
